eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base

Class SpringlesRepositoryBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.SpringlesRepositoryBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpringlesRepository, org.openrdf.repository.Repository
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpringlesStore

    public abstract class SpringlesRepositoryBase
extends Object
implements SpringlesRepository
    Base implementation of SpringlesRepository.

      • doInitialize

        protected abstract boolean doInitialize(AtomicReference<org.openrdf.model.ValueFactory> valueFactoryHolder,
                   AtomicReference<InferenceMode> inferenceModeHolder)
                                 throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Hook for performing subclass specific initialization logic. This method is called as part of the execution of initialize() and is synchronized externally. Exceptions thrown by this method will cause the initialization of the repository to fail.
        Parameters:
        valueFactoryHolder - a reference to the repository ValueFactory to be set by the method
        inferenceModeHolder - a reference to the repository InferenceMode to be set by the method
        Returns:
        true if writing access is supported
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in initialization failed for reasons different from configuration errors.

      • doShutdown

        protected void doShutdown()
        Hook for performing subclass specific shutdown logic. This method is called as part of the execution of shutDown() and is synchronized externally. This method should not throw exceptions, but simply log errors; if any exception is thrown, this will be caught externally, logged and ignored, so the whole shutdown process can complete.

      • createConnection

        protected SpringlesConnectionBase createConnection(String id)
                                            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Hook for the creation of SpringlesConnections. The default implementation creates a SpringlesConnectionBase. Subclasses may override this method to return specific subclasses of SpringlesConnectionBase.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the connection to create
        Returns:
        a new, possibly subclass-specific, repository connection
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - on failure

      • createTransactionRoot

        protected abstract Transaction createTransactionRoot(String transactionID,
                                TransactionMode transactionMode,
                                boolean autoCommit)
                                              throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Hook for the creation of root (un-decorated) transactions. This must be implemented by subclasses and is called each time a new transaction is created. It is a responsibility of the returned transaction to properly handle inference.
        Parameters:
        transactionID - a string identifier for the new transaction
        transactionMode - the transaction mode, guaranteed to be compatible with the inference and writing capabilities of the repository.
        autoCommit - true if the transaction will be used in auto-commit mode. Note that auto-committing is handled in SpringlesRepositoryBase; this parameter is supplied only because it can provide some opportunity for optimizing the created transaction
        Returns:
        the created transaction
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - on failure

      • decorateTransactionInternally

        protected Transaction decorateTransactionInternally(Transaction transaction,
                                        TransactionMode transactionMode,
                                        boolean autoCommit)
                                             throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Hook for decorating a transaction internally, before it is enhanced with synchronization, auto-commit and auto-closure support. This method is supplied with the transaction returned by createTransactionRoot(String, TransactionMode, boolean), protected with context-filtering so to exclude modifications of inferred statements. The default implementation of this method returns the supplied transaction unchanged. Subclasses may override the method decorating the transaction as they wish.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction to decorate
        transactionMode - the transaction mode, guaranteed to be compatible with the inference and writing capabilities of the repository
        autoCommit - true if the transaction will be used in auto-commit mode; this parameter is only informative, as auto-committing support will be added externally
        Returns:
        the decorated transaction
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - on failure

      • decorateTransactionExternally

        protected Transaction decorateTransactionExternally(Transaction transaction,
                                        TransactionMode transactionMode,
                                        boolean autoCommit)
                                             throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Hook for decorating a transaction before it is supplied for use by a SpringlesConnectionBase (after the optional addition of buffering support). This method is supplied with the transaction resulting from createTransactionRoot(String, TransactionMode, boolean), protected with context filtering, decorated interally as resulting from decorateTransactionInternally(Transaction, TransactionMode, boolean) and enhanced with synchronization, auto-commit and auto-closure support. The default implementation of this method returns the supplied transaction unchanged. Subclasses may override the method decorating the transaction as they wish.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction to decorate
        transactionMode - the transaction mode, guaranteed to be compatible with the inference and writing capabilities of the repository
        autoCommit - true if the transaction will be used in auto-commit mode; this parameter is only informative, as auto-committing is already implemented in the supplied transaction
        Returns:
        the decorated transaction
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - on failure
